viethai2002@gmail.com

Nguyen Viet Hai
Software Engineer
Industry professional in Software Engineering with excellent understanding of software developing life
circle, Software for finical operations and also maintenance for IT software systems. Focus on software
solution architect also maintain stability for internal software systems. 
Knowledge of Software  Analysis techniques using a variety of language and tools, as well as strong
logical thinking  and finical operations.
Ensure smooth software system  by understanding the techniques as well as business process. Working
responsibly, good teamwork as well as working good individually.
Summary Summary    
2018 - Current
2016 - 2018
2015 - 2016
2014 - 2015
HomeCredit Viet Nam
Senior Software Engineer
Transform the old local systems to effective and new technologies systems. Working with team, other
departments and core for analysis and development the internal tools. Research and propose new
technologies for company which is in the transformation period to the fin-tech company,  
Accomplishments:
Finish the Sending message tools which connect the internal systems to SMS partner system for sending
message to customer. There are 1 million message every day.
Maintenance and develop new Bonus Calculated system, which calculate bonus for sale and collector
team. 
Proposed new Business Work Flow system Activiti 6 and Alfresco for upgrading the old BPM System
AIA Viet Nam
Supervisor Software Developer
Developing and maintaining internal tools for processing operation Insurance Company. Mainly work on
Policy Owning Systems and  developing the business processing system. 
Accomplishments:
Enhance and maintain the POS system stable and effectively (Jboss portal)
Support and developing the interaction between local application with BPM systems for insurance
business process. Interaction through API Rest Webservice
Maintain and enhance function on Opentext Case 360 BPM system 
Great Eastern Viet Nam
Software Developer
• Create internal tools for managing agency and customer.
• Working on Liferay Portal. (J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, Ajax, HTML, CSS, JQuery…)
• Working on Windows server and tomcat server. Connecting with Oracle Database
• Oracle SQL, procedure, adding data transactions, ctl,..
• Maintaining web application.. 
Paris 13 University
Internship
Work experience
Work experience    
 https://www.visualcv.com/nguyen-viet-hai
2012 - 2014
This work for completing my Master degree.
• Formal verification of a distributed routing protocol for wireless sensor networks wire on a large scale
• Analyst network system for proving: Wireless sensor network (WSN).
• Modelling the system into Colored Petri net (CPN) to proving the system
• Proving WSN system in energy consuming - work mostly on modelling and proving on CPN 
• Reporting directly to professors Saadi Boudjit and Petrucci Laure
Reference link:
https://lipn.univ-paris13.fr/~petrucci/
http://www-l2ti.univ-paris13.fr/~boudjit/ 
MSERVICE VIET NAM
Java Developer
• Create report tools for company by using Web with J2EE, JSP, Servlet, Ajax, and HTML...
• Create Management tool on web and Notify application (Utiba Core)
• Working with Oracle database, database core design by Utiba.
• Working with PENTAHO reporting tools
